optimize-interface-layer-clipping.name: Optimize interface clipping
optimize-interface-layer-clipping.hint: Optimizes the way interface elements are erased for overlapping tokens. No visual degredation expected.

nameplate-caching.name: Cache token nameplates
nameplate-caching.hint: Caches nameplates to textures. No visual degradataion expected.

token-bars-caching.name: Cache token ressource bars
token-bars-caching.hint: Caches token Ressource bars to textures. Very minor visual degradataion expected.
